name: rédiger
description:
Story is currently INCOMPLETE.

Full game will be uploaded in about a week.

Made in 7 days for the Weekly Jam 101, under the theme "After the storm".

rédiger is a short choose-your-own-adventure digital novel, with computer generated abstract graphics.

In it, you play as an antagonist who is responsible for the destruction of the world, trying to cope with their destructive actions.

Use the arrow keys and space bar to play the game.

Music and sound design by Voltspeed

Graphics, programming, and writing by unplugred
